abstract: The private papers of public individuals can reveal the most intimate and unexpected details of a person's life.
snippet: The private papers of public individuals can reveal the most intimate and unexpected details of a person's life.
lead_paragraph: To check Debbie Nathan's piece on the multiple-personality postergirl Sybil, a photo researcher and I headed to the special collections room at John Jay College of Criminal Justice, which houses transcripts of Sybil's psychotherapy sessions. Going through the boxes of Sybil's late biographer, Flora Rheta Schreiber, which also contain her personal letters and photographs, impressed me with the intimacy of such collections. Here are some striking private details from the archives of three great public figures.

headline.main: My Three Favorite Collections of Private Papers
